Education.heroSubtitle: The all-in-one CRM designed to simplify school administration, track student success, and bridge the communication gap.
Education.feature1Desc: Real-time attendance tracking and behavioral analytics.

Healthcare.heroSubtitle: Optimize patient flows, manage resources in real-time, and improve care with our integrated Santé Connect platform.
Healthcare.feature1Desc: Real-time optimization of patient admission and orientation.
Healthcare.feature2Desc: Precise tracking of bed occupancy and staff availability.

Infrastructure.heroSubtitle: Deploy your applications on sovereign, secure infrastructure optimized for intensive workloads.
Infrastructure.feature1Desc: Data hosted 100% on national territory with Tier-IV security.
Infrastructure.feature2Desc: Instant access to the latest NVIDIA architectures for your ML models.

Hospitality.heroSubtitle: Optimize your establishment's management, from automated check-in to AI-driven guest experience personalization with Hospitality Hub.
Hospitality.feature1Desc: Unified guest profiles and AI personalization for memorable stays.
Hospitality.feature2Desc: Real-time optimization of housekeeping, room service, and maintenance.
Hospitality.feature3Desc: Instant synchronization with OTAs and commission-free direct booking engine.
